'''''"Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Iktomisaurus|text="Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar" â€” All-Twisting Obsidian Storm}} without being hit by the Obsidian Storm attack.

==Gameplay Notes==
* A {{Pyro}} user is essentially required for this achievement, as they will quickly destroy the {{Cryo}} shield deployed by the boss. There is a short time frame before the tornadoes turn into an arena-wide windstorm.
